sistema

Class Sala

  • java.lang.Object
    • sistema.Sala

  • public class Sala
extends java.lang.Object
    Sala.java

    A representation of a cinema room. It is characterized by the following attributes: id, name, number of rows, number of seats per row, setup time (in minutes), a reference to the cinema, scheduling.

    The attribute programmazione (scheduling) is used to keep trace of the show scheduling. The keys of this map are string representing the year, month and day of the shows (yyyy/mm/dd); the values are sorted lists that contain all the shows for the specified year, month and day.

    The class also provide a print method.

    Author:
    Sara Martino

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sala

        public Sala(java.lang.String nome,
    int numeroFile,
    int numeroPostiFila,
    int tempoAttrezzaggio,
    Cinema cinema)
        Constructs an object of type Sala using the input parameters.

        The id is set to -1. It is necessary to set it using the setId(int id) function after the creation.

        Parameters:
        nome - The name of the Sala
        numeroFile - Number of rows
        numeroPostiFila - Number of seats per row
        tempoAttrezzaggio - Setup time (in minutes)
        cinema - The cinema to which it belongs

      • verifyAvailabilitySingleShow

        private boolean verifyAvailabilitySingleShow(Spettacolo spettacolo)
        Verify the room availability for the show passed as input.

        Returns false if the room is not available (if the addition of the show passed as input would cause a scheduling overlapping).

        Parameters:
        spettacolo - The show for which you want to check the availability of the rooms
        Returns:
        true if the room is available for the date and duration of the show passed as input, false otherwise

      • verifyAvailability

        public boolean verifyAvailability(Spettacolo spettacolo,
                         int numberOfDays)
        Verify the room availability for the entire schedule of the show passed as input (depending on numberOfDays that represents the number of days you want to keep the show in schedule).

        Returns false if the room is not available (if the addition of the show passed as input would cause a scheduling overlapping).

        Parameters:
        spettacolo - The show for which you want to check the availability of the rooms
        numberOfDays - The number of days you want to keep the show in schedule
        Returns:
        true if the room is available for the date and duration of the show passed as input, false otherwise

      • addShow

        public boolean addShow(Spettacolo spettacolo,
              int numberOfDays)
        Adds a show schedule (defined by the show and the number of days you want to keep it in schedule) to the corresponding list of shows of the map programmazione, keeping the list sorted by key.

        Returns false if the room is not available (if the addition of the show passed as input would cause a scheduling overlapping) or if the id of this sala does not correspond to the id of the sala contained in s.

        Parameters:
        spettacolo - The show to add
        numberOfDays - The number of days you want to keep the show in schedule
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successfully completed, false otherwise

      • printAllShows

        public boolean printAllShows()
        Prints the shows scheduled in this sala.

        Returns false if there are no shows.

        Returns:
        true if the operation is successfully completed, false otherwise

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints base info of the Sala, i.e. id, name, capacity (number of rows, number of seats per row and total seats) and the setup time (in minutes).
